name: Umbra [DEMO]
description: You work for a cargo delivery service and your job is to ride around to different space stations to give them parts and goods they have delivered. Upon arriving at your next stop, you noticed it seems a bit too quiet for what is usually a busy station. Unable to turn back due to a malfunction with the entrance doors, you have no choice but to continue forward and find answers. Though you can't help but have a sinking feeling that you are in grave danger...
